name: SkyMine 3D!
description:
This is the 3D version of our game: SkyMine

Support our devlopment for more features!

What's new:

- basically EVERYTHING!

because i have made the whole game from scratch again

-fps boosted!

-infinite world!

-item physics

-better math

current fearures:

- World Generation (use perlin noise to generate)

- Small file size (4mb arhives)

- Inventory (WIP)

- Low End compatible

Controll: 

WASD - Move

Tab - Fly

Shift - Sneak

Left Mouse -destroy block

Right mouse - add block

Space - Jump

Upcoming Features:

- Multiplayer

- Crafting

- Multiple mode (creative / survival)

- More Fun
